item.title: 瓦莱罗能源公司（Valero Energy）公布季度利润下降，原因是利润率疲软
item.description: 炼油企业瓦莱罗能源公司（Valero Energy）周四公布的第二季度利润下降，原因是夏季驾车旺季不温不火以及全球炼油产能增加导致利润率下滑。【原文：Refiner Valero Energy posted lower second-quarter profit on Thursday, hurt by a slump in margins due to a tepid summer driving season and a rise in global refining capacity.】

item.title: 苏富比在香港开设零售店，押宝中国消费市场
item.description: 本周六，苏富比拍卖行将在香港推出新的销售方式，其首家零售店将出售从收藏级运动鞋到恐龙化石的各种物品，起价为几百美元。【原文：Sotheby's embarks on a new kind of selling in Hong Kong on Saturday, with its first retail outlet, stocking anything from collectable trainers to dinosaur fossils, with prices starting at several hundred dollars.】

item.title: 纽约银行旗下 Flagstar 以 14 亿美元出售利率敏感型住宅抵押贷款部门
item.description: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）旗下的旗星银行（Flagstar Bank）已同意以 14 亿美元的价格出售其住宅抵押贷款服务业务，以增加资本并专注于核心业务。【原文：New York Community Bancorp unit, Flagstar Bank, has agreed to sell its residential mortgage servicing business for $1.4 billion as it looks to boost capital and sharpen focus on its core businesses.】

item.title: 美国航空公司因定价压力下调年度利润预期
item.description: 美国航空公司周四下调了年度利润预期，原因是不均衡的需求趋势和某些市场的产能过剩削弱了该航空公司的定价能力，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了 8%。【原文：American Airlines cut its annual profit forecast on Thursday as uneven demand trends and overcapacity in certain markets dampened the carrier's pricing power, sending its shares down 8% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 独家报道：巴克莱银行在主要经纪人大战中收获对冲基金财富
item.description: 巴克莱银行正在赢得华尔街顶级竞争对手在大宗经纪业务方面的业务，这是一个利润丰厚的投资银行战场，在这里，贷款人正在为对冲基金提供一系列日益复杂的交易服务。【原文：Barclays is winning business from its top Wall Street rivals in prime brokerage, a lucrative investment banking battleground where lenders are battling to serve hedge funds in an array of increasingly complex trades.】

item.title: 通用汽车联合领投电动汽车电池材料初创公司 Addionics 的 3,900 万美元融资
item.description: 以色列电池技术公司 Addionics 周四表示，该公司已从包括通用汽车公司风险投资部门在内的投资者处筹集到 3900 万美元，用于帮助其电动汽车电池铜铝电极的商业化。【原文：Israeli battery technology company Addionics has raised $39 million from investors including General Motors' venture capital arm to help commercialise its copper and aluminium electrodes for electric vehicle batteries, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 法航首席财务官表示，全球技术故障将使法航荷航损失近 1100 万美元
item.description: 法航荷航（Air France KLM）财务总监史蒂文-扎特（Steven Zaat）周四表示，上周的全球技术故障将给公司带来约 1000 万欧元（1085 万美元）的损失。【原文：Air France KLM faces a hit of about 10 million euros ($10.85 million) from last week's global technology outage, finance chief Steven Zaat said on Thursday.】

item.title: 纳斯达克利润超预期，金融科技销售额飙升
item.description: 纳斯达克周四公布的第二季度利润超出预期，主要原因是市场对其帮助交易商满足合规要求和防范金融犯罪的产品需求强劲。【原文：Nasdaq beat estimates for second-quarter profit on Thursday, driven mainly by strong demand for its products that help traders navigate compliance requirements and safeguard against financial crimes.】

item.title: 哈雷戴维森第二季度利润增长，原因是对高价位摩托车的需求稳定
item.description: 哈雷戴维森公司（Harley-Davidson）周四公布的季度利润增长了 23%，原因是在利率上升和通胀压力的背景下，夏季骑行季节对其价格较高的摩托车的需求仍在增长。【原文：Harley-Davidson reported a 23% rise in quarterly profit on Thursday as demand held up for its pricier bikes during the summer riding season against the backdrop of higher interest rates and inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司因武器需求上调 2024 年盈利预期
item.description: 美国国防公司诺斯罗普-格鲁曼（Northrop Grumman）周四上调了全年营收和利润预期，原因是全球国防开支增加，且积压订单强劲。【原文：U.S. defense company Northrop Grumman raised its forecast for full-year revenue and profit on Thursday, amid increased global defense spending and a strong backlog.】

item.title: RTX 下调 2024 年利润预期
item.description: 受商用航空业反弹的推动，美国航空航天与国防公司 RTX 周四上调了全年盈利预期。【原文：U.S. aerospace and defense company RTX raised its full-year profit forecast on Thursday, driven by a rebound in the broader commercial aviation sector.】

item.title: 皇家加勒比集团上调年度盈利预期，邮轮需求蓬勃发展
item.description: 皇家加勒比集团周四上调了年度利润预期，这是今年以来第三次上调预期，原因是游轮度假需求持续旺盛，且船票价格上涨。【原文：Royal Caribbean Group raised its annual profit forecast on Thursday for the third time this year on the back of continued demand for cruise vacations and higher ticket pricing.】

item.title: 拉扎德公布第二季度利润，投资银行业务反弹
item.description: 拉扎德（Lazard）周四公布，受核心投资银行业务复苏的推动，该公司第二季度实现盈利。【原文：Lazard reported a profit for the second quarter on Thursday, driven by a recovery in its core investment banking business.】

item.title: 西南航空第二季度利润超出预期，标志着向高端座位的转变
item.description: 美国西南航空公司周四公布的第二季度利润超出了分析师的预期，并表示将在客舱内引入指定座位和高级座位，这标志着该公司的传统业务模式发生了重大转变。【原文：Southwest Airlines beat analysts' expectations for second-quarter profit on Thursday and said it would introduce both assigned and premium seating in its cabins, marking a significant shift away from its traditional business model.】

item.title: 庞巴迪季度收入增长32%，原因是喷气机交付量增加
item.description: 庞巴迪公司第二季度的收入增长了32%，主要得益于飞机交付量的增加以及这家加拿大公务机制造商服务业务销售额的增长。【原文：Bombardier's second-quarter revenue rose 32%, helped by higher plane deliveries and stronger sales in the Canadian business jet maker's services business.】

item.title: 玩具制造商孩之宝扭亏为盈，季度销售额和利润大幅增长
item.description: 孩之宝公司（Hasbro）周四公布的第二季度销售额降幅小于预期，原因是稳定的数字游戏需求抵消了玩具销售的下滑，而成本控制策略帮助该玩具制造商实现了超预期的利润。【原文：Hasbro posted a smaller-than-expected drop in second-quarter sales on Thursday as steady digital gaming demand offset a slump in toy sales, while cost-control strategies helped the toymaker beat profit expectations.】

item.title: 英国监管机构以控制不力为由对 Coinbase 的 CB 支付公司处以罚款
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（FCA）对Coinbase业务CB Payments Limited（CPBL）处以350万英镑（约合450万美元）的罚款，原因是其反洗钱控制不力，这是该监管机构首次对参与加密资产交易的公司采取执法行动。【原文：Britain's Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) has fined Coinbase business CB Payments Limited (CPBL) 3.5 million pounds ($4.5 million) for poor anti-money laundering controls, the watchdog's first enforcement action against a company involved in cryptoassets trading.】

item.title: 陶氏利润低于预期，原因是亚洲和欧洲需求下降
item.description: 受亚洲和欧洲等主要市场价格和需求下降的影响，化学品生产商陶氏周四未能实现预期的第二季度利润。【原文：Chemicals maker Dow missed second-quarter profit estimates on Thursday, hurt by lower prices and demand in key markets including Asia and Europe.】

item.title: 元监督委员会要求公司清理有关人工智能生成色情内容的规则
item.description: Meta 监督委员会周四表示，该公司的规则在禁止人工智能生成的真人性描写方面 "不够明确"，并呼吁进行修改，以阻止此类图像在其平台上传播。【原文：Meta's Oversight Board on Thursday said the company's rules were "not sufficiently clear" in barring sexually explicit AI-generated depictions of real people and called for changes to stop such imagery from circulating on its platforms.】

item.title: 早间竞标：增长焦虑还是空气袋？股价维持跌势
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 特朗普和共和党人在 "比特币 2024 "大会上争夺加密货币选票和美元
item.description: 共和党提名人、美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普曾抨击加密货币，称其为 "骗局"。而现在，他却成为了该行业最大会议之一的主讲人。【原文：Republican nominee and former U.S. President Donald Trump once blasted cryptocurrency, calling it a "scam." Now, he is headlining one of the industry's biggest conferences.】

item.title: 独家报道墨西哥原油产量下降可能打破能源独立梦想
item.description: 墨西哥即将上任的总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）在实现能源独立的梦想方面可能会面临新的挑战，她的前任曾斥资 170 亿美元建造一座新的炼油厂：国内原油供应短缺。【原文：Mexico's incoming President Claudia Sheinbaum will likely face a new challenge fulfilling the dream of energy independence that led her predecessor to spend $17 billion on a new refinery: a shortfall in domestic crude supply.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后，经济学家认为通胀将重现，美联储将更加谨慎
item.description: 如果唐纳德-特朗普重新入主白宫，美联储控制通胀的斗争可能会面临新的挑战，这一动态可能会使美国中央银行重新回到这位前共和党总统的十字路口。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s battle to get inflation under control likely faces fresh challenges should Donald Trump regain the White House, a dynamic that could put the U.S. central bank back in the former Republican president's crosshairs.】

item.title: 美国汽车市场让斯泰兰特和日产汽车吃尽苦头
item.description: 周四，竞争激烈的美国汽车市场出现了各种问题，从价格疲软、库存高企到物流困难，这些问题削弱了汽车制造商斯太朗蒂斯（Stellantis）和日产（Nissan）的利润，也打击了它们的股价，因为它们正努力寻找解决问题的办法。【原文：Problems in the highly competitive U.S. car market ranging from weak prices to high inventories and difficult logistics dented profits and hit shares of automakers Stellantis and Nissan on Thursday, as they scramble to find a fix.】

item.title: 监管机构称四家英国高街银行违反零售业竞争规则
item.description: 英国竞争与市场管理局（Competition and Markets Authority）周四发表声明称，汇丰银行（HSBC）、劳埃德银行（Lloyds）、TSB 银行（TSB）和爱尔兰联合银行（AIB）这四家高街银行违反了英国的竞争规则。【原文：Four high street banks, HSBC, Lloyds, TSB and Allied Irish Bank (AIB), broke Britain's competition rules, the Competition and Markets Authority said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 华尔街大盘股领跌一天后 期货市场无精打采
item.description: 周四，美国股指期货走势平淡，一天前，大型科技股的大幅下挫导致 S&P 500 指数和纳斯达克指数创下自 2022 年以来的最大跌幅，投资者还在为一系列财报和经济数据做准备。【原文：U.S. index futures were muted on Thursday, a day after a crushing selloff in megacap tech stocks steered the S&P 500 and Nasdaq to their biggest drop since 2022, with investors also bracing for a bevy of earnings and economic data.】

item.title: 华为中国智能手机出货量大增，苹果份额下降
item.description: 研究公司 Canalys 的数据显示，华为 2024 年第二季度的智能手机出货量同比猛增 41%，而苹果公司在中国的市场份额则下滑了约两个百分点。【原文：Huawei's smartphone shipments jumped 41% year on year in the second quarter of 2024 while Apple Inc's market share slipped by about two percentage points in China, data from research firm Canalys showed.】

item.title: CyberCube称，CrowdStrike故障造成的保险损失可能达到15亿美元
item.description: 网络分析公司 CyberCube 周四表示，上周大规模 IT 故障造成的全球保险损失可能在 4 亿至 15 亿美元之间。【原文：Global insured losses from last week's massive IT outage are likely to range from $400 million to $1.5 billion, cyber analytics firm CyberCube said on Thursday.】

item.title: 全球投资者争相躲避美国大选 "曲线球
item.description: 在11月5日美国总统大选之前，投资者正争先恐后地保护全球投资组合免受市场剧烈波动的影响，并从大型科技股和欧洲政府债务等处于不确定性风口浪尖的资产中撤出。【原文：Investors are scrambling to shore up global portfolios against wild market swings ahead of the Nov. 5 U.S. presidential election and backing out of assets stuck in the crosshairs of uncertainty, from big tech stocks to European government debt.】

item.title: 达美航空航班中断事件影响其高端品牌形象
item.description: 在美国的大型航空公司中，达美航空公司一直致力于建立优质航空公司的声誉，标榜其运营相对于同行而言准时可靠。但在过去几天里，它的品牌形象受到了损害。【原文：Among the big U.S. carriers, Delta Air Lines has assiduously built a reputation as a premium airline, touting its punctual and reliable operations relative to peers. But over the last several days, its brand image has been dented.】
